hero.description: With us, you will discover amazing corners of the planet that you could only dream of before. Enjoy the beauty of the world, immersing yourself in the culture, nature and history that make each place unique. Let each of your trips be unforgettable and full of vivid impressions.

info.card1: Choose the best price for the tour on our website
info.card2: Send a request and we will select a tour for you
info.card3: Pay for the tour in any convenient way

tours.description: At Fayd, we have put together a collection of tours that reflect the diversity and richness of our planet. From ancient cities to untouched nature reserves, we have a tour for everyone. Explore the world with us and choose your perfect itinerary:
tours.malaysia-description: Here you can find ancient temples, colonial cities, tropical forests and beautiful beaches.
tours.qatar-description: Qatar is a wealthy country known for its skyscrapers, luxury shops and expensive cars.
tours.thailand-description: Thailand is famous for its islands, picturesque beaches, culture and rich cuisine.
tours.egypt-description: A country in northeastern Africa, known for its ancient history and cultural heritage.
tours.turkey-description: Famous for its Mediterranean coastline and rich history, you can enjoy the magnificent culture and delicious Turkish cuisine.
tours.dubai-description: The largest city in the UAE, famous for its tall skyscrapers, luxurious shopping malls and amazing theme parks.
